articles.title: Nintendo Switch Sees Its First Significant Price Drop in the US - IGN - IGN
articles.description: Nintendo Switch has finally seen its first significant price drop in the US, months after a similar reduction in price in Europe.
articles.content:
Nintendo Switch has seen its first significant price drop ever in the US, months after regions such as the UK and Europe saw a similar reduction in price.
